channel.title: Knowing (2009)
channel.description:
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0448011/
A teacher opens a time capsule that has been dug up at his son's elementary school; in it are some chilling predictions -- some that have already occurred and others that are about to -- that lead him to believe his family plays a role in the events that are about to unfold.
This was on the tv yesterday and because I'm a huge Nick Cage fan I decided to watch it. I thought it was going to be shit because I hadn't ever heard of it before but allah was I wrong. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,501040.0.html] The ending is sort of like The Box(that I wrote about a few months ago)[/url] however it does it so much better, although you are left with the feeling of "what the fuck just happened" it also leaves you with the feeling of "Actually that sort of does make sense". Lovely movie hope you enjoy it too if you watch it, and I'd like to know what you guys thought about it.

item.title: Knowing (2009)

Should go along with your tastes better: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0974977/
[/quote]

Driven by biological excess, a young man and woman search for sexual fulfillment, unaware of each other’s existence. Unfortunately, they eventually meet, and the bonding of these two very unusual human beings ends in an explosive and ultimately over-the-top sexual experience, resulting in a truly god awful love story

It doesn’t have nick cage in it - I’M NOT INTERETESTED[/quote]It has a female with 7x clit and a man with a living penis that rapes hookers during the night

A teacher opens a time capsule that has been dug up at his son’s elementary school; in it are some chilling predictions – some that have already occurred and others that are about to – that lead him to believe his family plays a role in the events that are about to unfold.

This was on the tv yesterday and because I’m a huge Nick Cage fan I decided to watch it. I thought it was going to be shit because I hadn’t ever heard of it before but allah was I wrong.

The ending is sort of like The Box(that I wrote about a few months ago) however it does it so much better, although you are left with the feeling of “what the fuck just happened” it also leaves you with the feeling of “Actually that sort of does make sense”.

Lovely movie hope you enjoy it too if you watch it, and I’d like to know what you guys thought about it.[/quote]Should go along with your tastes better: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0974977/

item.title: Knowing (2009)
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

IMDb

Knowing (2009)

Directed by Alex Proyas. With Nicolas Cage, Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne, Lara Robinson. M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate...

A teacher opens a time capsule that has been dug up at his son's elementary school; in it are some chilling predictions -- some that have already occurred and others that are about to -- that lead him to believe his family plays a role in the events that are about to unfold.

This was on the tv yesterday and because I’m a huge Nick Cage fan I decided to watch it. I thought it was going to be shit because I hadn’t ever heard of it before but allah was I wrong.

The ending is sort of like The Box(that I wrote about a few months ago) however it does it so much better, although you are left with the feeling of “what the fuck just happened” it also leaves you with the feeling of “Actually that sort of does make sense”.

Lovely movie hope you enjoy it too if you watch it, and I’d like to know what you guys thought about it.

Read full topic
